name: AMZY Creations
description: AMZY Creations – Web & Multimedia Solutions Partner in Bangalore. We started in 2013 with a single aim of providing top quality service, solutions, and products to the IT industry. The core group consists of passionate visionaries, creative designers in addition to unorthodox developers, inventive strategists and uber-cool creators always discovering new methods for creating an instant connection between a brand and its consumers.
